Module com.fy916.bubblebobble

Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers

package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    A superclass of the javafx controllers that includes some basic properities that is used by all controllers
    GameController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the GameRefresher to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
    GameFinishController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the SaveScoreImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
    InfoController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the InfoPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
    LeaderBoardController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the LeaderBoardImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
    MainController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the MainPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
    SaveScoreController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the SaveScoreImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
    SettingsController
    This class is extended from Controller.
    This class utilize the SettingsPageImageLoader to facilitate the rendering process.
    Demonstrates the FACADE Design Pattern.
